EmailTemplate.name: BK_GDPR_Data_Management_mih.BK_Confirmation_SingleOptIn_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome! - Subscription Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]> YOU'RE CONNECTED Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
You have successfully subscribed to BendixKing e-communications.* That means you’ll be able to get exclusive updates about our offerings, news and events and special offers. Can’t wait? Check our website here <[[https://bendixking.com/]]>. Thank you!
BendixKing*E-communications refers to email, social media and digital advertising.
You can unsubscribe from our email communications at any time. To unsubscribe, please click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2017_Email_Confirmation_OptOut.html]]>.
